TalentsTiers.Name: Frostbite
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives your Chill effects a [@value]% chance to freeze the target for [@value2] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Frostbolt
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the casting time of your Frostbolt spell by [@value] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Ice Floes
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Frost Nova, Cone of Cold, Ice Block and Icy Veins spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Ice Shards
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Mage Frost spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Frost Warding
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the armor and resistances given by your Frost Armor and Ice Armor spells by [@value]%. In addition, gives your Frost Ward and Fire Ward a [@value2]% chance to negate the warded damage spell and restore mana equal to the damage caused.

TalentsTiers.Name: Elemental Precision
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the mana cost and increases your chance to hit with spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Permafrost
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the duration of your Chill effects by [@value] sec and reduces the target's speed by an additional [@value2]% and reduces the targets healing received by [@value3]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Piercing Ice
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage done by your Mage Frost spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Icy Veins
TalentsTiers.Description:
2% of base mana
Instant
3 min cooldown

Hastens your spellcasting, increasing spell casting speed by 20% and reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks while casting mage spells by 100%. Lasts 20 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Blizzard
TalentsTiers.Description: Adds a chill effect to your Blizzard spell. This effect lowers the target's movement speed by [@value2]%. Lasts [@value][@value3] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Arctic Reach
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the range of your Frostbolt, Ice Lance, Deep Freeze and Blizzard spells and the radius of your Frost Nova and Cone of Cold spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Frost Channeling
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the mana cost of all spells by [@value]% and reduces the threat caused by your Frost spells by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Shatter
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical strike chance of all your Mage spells against frozen targets by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Cold Snap
TalentsTiers.Description:
Instant Cast
8 min cooldown

When activated, this spell finishes the cooldown on all Frost Mage spells you recently cast.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Cone of Cold
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage dealt by your Cone of Cold spell by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Frozen Core
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the damage taken from all spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Cold as Ice
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Cold Snap, Ice Barrier, Deep Freeze and Summon Water Elemental spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Winters Chill
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your chance to critically hit with Frostbolt by an additional [@value]% and gives your Frost damage spells a [@value2]% chance to apply the Winter's Chill effect, which increases the chance spells will critically hit the target by [@value3]% for [@value4] sec. Stacks up to [@value5] times.

TalentsTiers.Name: Shattered Barrier
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives your Ice Barrier spell a [@value]% chance to freeze all enemies within [@value2] yds for [@value3] sec when it is destroyed.

TalentsTiers.Name: Ice Barrier
TalentsTiers.Description:
16% of base mana
Instant Cast
30 sec cooldown

Instantly shields you, absorbing 3300 damage. Lasts 1 min. While the shield holds, spellcasting will not be delayed by damage.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks

TalentsTiers.Name: Arctic Winds
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases all Frost damage you cause by [@value]% and reduces the chance melee and ranged attacks will hit you by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Empowered Frostbolt
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage of your Frostbolt spell by an amount equal to [@value2]% of your spell power and reduces the cast time by [@value] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Fingers of Frost
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives your Chill effects a [@value]% chance to grant you the Fingers of Frost effect, which treats your next [@value2] spells cast as if the target were Frozen. Lasts [@value3] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Brain Freeze
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Mage Frost damage spells have a [@value]% chance to cause your next Fireball or Frostfire Bolt spell to be instant cast and cost no mana.

TalentsTiers.Name: Summon Water Elemental
TalentsTiers.Description:
16% of base mana
Instant Cast
3 min cooldown

Summon a Water Elemental to fight for the caster for 45 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Water Elemental
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the duration of your Summon Water Elemental spell by [@value] sec and your Frost Bolt spell has a [@value2]% chance to grant up to [@value3] party or raid members mana regeneration equal to [@value4]% of their total mana every 5 sec for [@value5] sec. This effect cannot occur more often than once every [@value6] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Chilled to the Bone
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage caused by your Frostbolt, Frostfire Bolt and Ice Lance spells by [@value]% and reduces the movement speed of all chilled targets by an additional [@value2]%

TalentsTiers.Name: Deep Freeze
TalentsTiers.Description:
7% of base mana
30 yd range

Instant Cast
30 sec cooldown

Stuns the target for 5 sec. Only usable on Frozen targets. Deals 1469 to 1741 damage to targets permanently immune to stuns.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks
